name: Fus Ro Borf
description:
The Food bowl is empty, John is gone! PANIC!! Play as a hungry corgi who has to bark and fight his way past dusty bunny foes of the living room on the journey to find his missing owner!

Just a short game created over a few days, enjoy!

CONTROLS: 

WASD to move around.

B to Bark! 

Created by Gabrielle Harte and Travis Willis
